nodes.text: The WQ80 barrel, also known as the "Longshot" barrel, was a model of marksman barrel produced by SoroSuub Corporation for blaster rifles. The barrels cost 1200 and were available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. The barrels were designed to increase a rifle's range and accuracy, and measured two meters in length.
WQ80 barrel were first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014.
